abstract: Police discover body of 8-year-old girl Madyson Middleton inside Tannery Arts Center in Santa Cruz, Calif, following daylong search; charge Middleton's neighbor Adrian Jerry Gonzalez with murder, kidnapping and sexual assault; Gonzalez, who is 15 years old, will be tried as an adult; discovery brings gruesome end to days of uncertainty in idyllic artists' colony after Middleton, whose family was part of Tannery community, went missing.
lead_paragraph: An idyllic artists’ colony at the edge of Santa Cruz, Calif., was thrust into a harsh reality with the killing of an 8-year-old girl.

headline.main: Hunt for California Girl Leads to a Body, and a Neighbor, 15
headline.print_headline: Hunt for California Girl Leads to a Body, and a Neighbor, 15

snippet: An idyllic artists’ colony at the edge of Santa Cruz, Calif., was thrust into a harsh reality with the killing of an 8-year-old girl.
